attributes.action: Bring into force legally binding rules for the accountability of public servants, including Members of Parliament, Senior Civil Servants and Senior Council Employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I request that the Prime Minister brings into effect, by the end of 2009, clear and legally binding rules for the conduct, morally and financially, of all Members of Parliament, Senior Civil Servants and Senior Council Employees.
That exemption is only permitted, with prior authorisation by a committee, if National security is jeopardised.
That breaches of these rules are investigated by the Police and where rules have been breached the accused face a trial by a jury of the electorate, with punishments including, removal from office, fines and imprisonment.
That those listed above behave within the law at all times, and are brought to justice when they act outside the law.
